decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be completed within 3 years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To accord with the provisions of paragraph MA.2 (5) Part 3, Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and specifications: Location Plan s2-1, Cover letter, 3022/01, 3022/02, 3022/03. Received: 05/07/2024. Drawing and Document Issue Register 1, 3022-010, 3022-020, 3022-030. Received: 17/10/2024.
Reason: In order to ensure the development is carried out in accordance with the planning permission.

Condition : 3 - The hereby approved dwellinghouse is to remain in use as a dwellinghouse within the meaning of Class C3 of Schedule 1 to the Use Classes Order and for no other purpose, except to the extent that the other purpose is ancillary to the use as a dwellinghouse.
Reason: To accord with the provisions of paragraph MA.2 (6) of Class MA, Part 3, Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

Condition : 4 - Before the development hereby permitted is first occupied or brought into use, the Local Planning Authority shall be informed of the agreed naming and numbering of the proposed dwellings so that arrangements can be put in place to ensure that, with the exception of a person eligible for a disabled person's badge issued pursuant to section 21 of the Chronically Sick and Disabled Persons Act 1970 (or similar legislation), no resident of the development shall obtain a resident's parking permit. Any occupiers of the approved development shall surrender any such permit wrongly issued or held.
Reason: In order to protect the free flow and safety of traffic on nearby highways and to support sustainable transport objectives.

Condition : 5 - Secure covered cycle parking facilities (for not less than two bicycles) for the occupants of, and visitors to, the development shall be installed in the rear garden. The approved facilities shall conform to the current Westtrans West London Cycle Parking Guidance( or such other guidance as shall supersede it) in design and layout and be fully implemented and made available for use before the first occupation of the development or commencement of the approved use as appropriate and thereafter retained for use at all times without obstruction. 
Reason: In order to support sustainable transport objectives.
description: Prior Approval notification for the change of use from commercial, financial services (Use Class E(c)(i)) to a single family house (Use Class C3).
